School tour question list (copy/paste)

A copy/paste question list for school tours: learning support, supervision, communication, and commute reality.

#schools#tours#template#parents
Pillar: Schools & learning: how to choose a fit

Copy/paste questions

Learning & support

  • How do you support kids who are ahead / behind?
  • How do you communicate progress to parents?
  • What does support look like day-to-day?

Safety & supervision

  • What supervision ratios do you aim for?
  • What’s the protocol for injuries?
  • How do you handle pick-up and drop-off?

Community & fit

  • What kind of child thrives here?
  • What do new families find hard in the first month?
  • How do you help kids make friends?

Commute reality

  • Where do most families live?
  • What does traffic look like during rainy season?

Related

  • What to ask on a school tour
  • Schools & learning
